name: Primus LiTech Pot Set 2.3L
description: Make pasta in one, and sauce in the other. Perfect for 2 campers who don't want to scoop food from a bag.Made of hard anodized aluminum with a ceramic non-stick coatingBPA-free transparent lid works on both pots, built-in drainage port for use as a colander.Self-locking pot grip works on both pots and provides a full, comfortable grip.Efficient nesting design.
